name: Helsinki Region Infoshare
description: Open data service from the Greater Helsinki region in Finland. Datasets, showcases, and other content. The site is developed in cooperation with the six largest cities in Finland as part of the 'Open Data and Interfaces' project of the 6Aika-cooperation strategy. The data catalogue uses the CKAN platform, and the metadata model is based on the DCAT-AP model.
owner_name: City of Helsinki, Forum Virium Helsinki, City of Helsinki Urban Facts (joint)
